entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
